definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="damage">damage</variable><variable type="Number" id="boost">boost</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="36"><field name="trigger">entity_pre_hurt</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="variables_get_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:being_damaged_flag</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems_oredictionary"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">better_tools:precision_weapons</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">only re-damage entity if they are on full HP</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="entity_health_max"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="cancel_event"><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:being_damaged_flag</field><comment pinned="false" h="83" w="505">prevents a stack overflow error caused by the entity being re-damaged by the procedure</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:damage</field><value name="VAL"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">amount</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:boost</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_ternary_op" inline="false"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" mark="false"></mutation><value name="condition"><block type="compare_mcitems_oredictionary"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">better_tools:crystallite_axes</field></block></value></block></value><value name="THEN"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="ELSE"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2.5</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">if source entity cannot deal a critical hit, always add 2.5.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="has_attribute"><field name="attribute">CUSTOM:CriticalHitMultiplier</field><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:damage</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">account for extra crit damage, if this is a player</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:damage</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_ternary_op" inline="false"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" mark="false"></mutation><value name="condition"><block type="variables_get_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:critical_hit</field><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="THEN"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:boost</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="get_attribute_whole"><field name="attribute">CUSTOM:CriticalHitMultiplier</field><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="ELSE"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:boost</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:damage</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:damage</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:boost</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="deal_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:damage</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_type_cause_directcause" inline="false"><field name="damagetype">PLAYER_ATTACK</field><value name="cause"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="directcause"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:being_damaged_flag</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="variables_get_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:critical_hit</field><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:critical_hit</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="spawn_particle_multi" inline="false"><field name="particle">CRIT</field><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="entity_pos_x"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_pos_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_pos_z"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.05</field></block></value><next><block type="spawn_particle_multi" inline="false"><field name="particle">DAMAGE_INDICATOR</field><value name="count"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">DIVIDE</field><value name="A"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">amount</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></value><value name="x"><block type="entity_pos_x"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_pos_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_pos_z"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.4</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.6</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.4</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.025</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
